snippet: Industrial production continues to rise in countries like India and China, but has stalled out in much of the developed world. In the United States, it is rising, but remains below the level reached in 2007.
lead_paragraph: Industrial production continues to rise in countries like India and China, but has stalled out in much of the developed world. In the United States, it is rising, but remains below the level reached in 2007.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: In the Developed World, Industrial Production Stalls
headline.main: Off the Charts: In the Developed World, Industrial Production Stalls
